english.segment1: Don't you know that every song starts with an intro, Quiet 'til the middle then it picks up and goes on..and on and on. Don't you know that every song starts with an intro, Quiet 'til the middle then it picks up and goes on
english.segment2: And it goes on. And on and on and on. And it goes on. And on and on and on. And it goes on. And on and on and on. And it goes on, yeah. Yeah, yeah
english.segment3: Make sure your guitars are loud, Loud enough to move the crowd. Feedback is essential. Know that my voice is smooth and clean. Like the gentle of your amp before you scream, "Yeaaah" lets rock and roll
english.segment4: And it goes. One Mississippi. Two Mississippi. Three Mississippi. Four and it goes. One Mississippi. Two Mississippi. Three Mississippi. Four and it goes
english.segment5: On and on and on. And it goes on. And on and on and on. And it goes on. And on and on and on. And it goes on, yeah. Yeah, yeah
